Name: 75 Cocktail (MacElhone's 1926 recipe)
Ingredients: 40 ml Calvados / apple brandy / straight applejack
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist (discarded) & star anise.
Review: Like the gun this cocktail is named after, this small cocktail packs a hell of a punch, and to ensure it does, MacElhone calls for a couple of dashes of absinthe in place of the lemon juice used in earlier Soixante-Quinze (Seventy-Five) recipes. The result is a dry, spirituous drink.
History: Adapted from a recipe in Harry MacElhone's 's 1926 Harry ABC of Mixing Cocktails .
Nutrition: One serving of 75 Cocktail (MacElhone's 1926 recipe) contains 159 calories
